subject: Fix layout presets: text distribution and icon accuracy
body:
Text overcrowding fixes (moved bodyHeading/bodyText to image cells):
- stacked-quad: cell 0 had 4 texts in 20% → now 2 texts, others on cell 1
- tall-feature: cell 0 had 4 texts in 15% → now 2 texts, others on cell 2
- wide-feature: cell 1 had 4 texts in 20% → now 2 texts, others on cell 2
- columns-four: cell 3 had 4 texts in 25% → now 2 texts, others on cell 2

SVG icon fixes (show all image cells in blue):
- quad-grid: cell 3 now blue (diagonal layout)
- stacked-quad: cell 2 now blue (dual image)
- header-quad: cell 4 now blue (diagonal layout)
- wide-feature: cell 0 now blue (dual image)
- tall-feature: cell 1 now blue (dual image)
- columns-four: cell 2 now blue (alternating)
- asymmetric-grid: cell 3 now blue (diagonal layout)
